channel.title: GM 110 Bagpipe patch?
channel.description: Have any of you Axo wizards created a patch that can emulate a set of bagpipes reasonably well? I'd be interested in this... or something close. Or some hints as to modifications I could make to an existing wind instrument patch to get that effect of a bagpipe (maybe use of my midi breath controller?).

item.title: GM 110 Bagpipe patch?
item.dc:creator: @timeorspace Tim
item.description:
@timeorspace wrote:

Have any of you Axo wizards created a patch that can emulate a set of bagpipes reasonably well?
I'd be interested in this... or something close. Or some hints as to modifications I could make to an existing wind instrument patch to get that effect of a bagpipe (maybe use of my midi breath controller?).
